scripts.db:migrate:create: set -a; [ -f ./.env ] && . ./.env; set +a; node-pg-migrate create --migrations-dir db/migrations --migration-file-language sql
scripts.db:migrate:up: set -a; [ -f ./.env ] && . ./.env; set +a; node-pg-migrate up --migrations-dir db/migrations --migration-file-language sql
scripts.db:migrate:down: set -a; [ -f ./.env ] && . ./.env; set +a; node-pg-migrate down --migrations-dir db/migrations --migration-file-language sql
